verses.verse: Then Jonah <S%H3124><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> from the stomach <S%H4578><s%> of the fish, <S%H1710><s%>

and he said, <S%H559><s%> "I called <S%H7121><s%> out of my distress <S%H6869><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And He answered <S%H6030><s%> me. I cried <S%H7768><s%> for help <S%H7768><s%> from the depth <S%H990><s%> of Sheol; <S%H7585><s%> Thou didst hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%>

"For Thou hadst cast <S%H7993><s%> me into the deep, <S%H4688><s%> Into the heart <S%H3824><s%> of the seas, <S%H3220><s%> And the current <S%H5104><s%> engulfed <S%H5437><s%> me. All <S%H3605><s%> Thy breakers <S%H4867><s%> and billows <S%H1530><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> me.

"So I said, <S%H559><s%> 'I have been expelled <S%H1644><s%> from Thy sight. <S%H5869><s%> Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> I will look <S%H5027><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%>'

"Water <S%H4325><s%> encompassed <S%H661><s%> me to the point of death. <S%H5315><s%> The great deep <S%H8415><s%> engulfed <S%H5437><s%> me, Weeds <S%H5488><s%> were wrapped <S%H2280><s%> around my head. <S%H7218><s%>

"I descended <S%H3381><s%> to the roots <S%H7095><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> with its bars <S%H1280><s%> [was] around <S%H1157><s%> me forever, <S%H5769><s%> But Thou hast brought <S%H5927><s%> up my life <S%H9132><s%> from the pit, <S%H7845><s%> O Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>

"While I was fainting <S%H5848><s%> away, <S%H5848><s%> I remembered <S%H2142><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> And my prayer <S%H8605><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Thee, Into Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%>
"Those who regard <S%H8104><s%> vain <S%H7723><s%> idols <S%H1892><s%> Forsake <S%H5800><s%> their faithfulness, <S%H2617><s%>

But I will sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to Thee With the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thanksgiving. <S%H8426><s%> That which <S%H834><s%> I have vowed <S%H5087><s%> I will pay. <S%H9608><s%> Salvation <S%H3444><s%> is from the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H559><s%> the fish, <S%H1709><s%> and it vomited <S%H9513><s%> Jonah <S%H3124><s%> up onto <S%H413><s%> the dry <S%H3004><s%> land. <S%H3004><s%>
